Layton.Northern Utah Academy for Math Engineeri: The Northern Utah Academy for Math Engineering and Science (NUAMES) is a public charter high school for students in grades 10-12. The school was started in 2004 to provide an educational experience that prepares high school students for an early transition into a university baccalaureate program in fields related to math, engineering or science. Students who have attended NUAMES for a full year and meet Weber State's admission requirements receive a scholarship to attend the university while they are also completing their high school diploma.
